scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @kozatakip/api" "npm run dev -w @kozatakip/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @kozatakip/shared && npm run build -w @kozatakip/api && npm run build -w @kozatakip/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @kozatakip/shared && npm run typecheck -w @kozatakip/api && npm run typecheck -w @kozatakip/web
